46  // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
47  // ... Always use atomic units
48  // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
49  // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
50  // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
51 
52  // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
53  // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
54  // ... ... Positions in nm
55  // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
56  // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
57 
58  // CONVERSION FACTORS
59  // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
60  // * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
61  // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
62  //
63  // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9

245  inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
246 
247  Topology *_top;
248  XMP *_xm;
249 
250  };
251 
252  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
253  // XJob (distr. among threads) //
254  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
255 
256  class XJob
257  {
258  public:
259 
260  XJob(int id, string tag, string job_type, int site_id,
261  int pairId, int seg1Id, int seg2Id,
262  string mps1, string mps2, Topology *top) :
263 
264  _id(id), _tag(tag), _pairId(pairId),
265  _type(job_type), _seg1Id(seg1Id), _seg2Id(seg2Id),
266  _mps1(mps1), _mps2(mps2), _start_from_cpt(false),
267  _site_id(site_id) {
268 
269  _seg1 = top->getSegment(seg1Id);
270  _seg2 = top->getSegment(seg2Id);
271 
272  // JOB TYPE: PAIR
273  if (job_type == "pair") {
274 
275  // Watch out for periodic-boundary correction
276  _pair = top->NBList().FindPair(_seg1,_seg2);
277 
278  if (_pair == NULL) {
279  cout << endl
280  << "WARNING: No such pair " << pairId
281  << "(SEG1 " << seg1Id << ", SEG2 " << seg2Id << "). "
282  << flush;
283  throw runtime_error("Pair specs do not match topology.");
284  }
285 
286  assert ( pairId == _pair->getId() ); // Inconsistency in job input w.r.t. top
287 
288  _center = ( _pair->Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
289  * _pair->Seg1PbCopy()->getPos()
290 
291  + _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
292  * _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->getPos() )
293 
294  / (_pair->Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
295  + _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().size() );
296  }
297 
298  // JOB TYPE: SITE
299  else if (job_type == "site") {
300 
301  if (_site_id == seg1Id) { _center = _seg1->getPos();
302  _site = _seg1; }
303  else if (_site_id == seg2Id) { _center = _seg2->getPos();
304  _site = _seg2; }
305  else { throw runtime_error("ERROR: "
306  "No such site " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_site_id) +
307  " in job " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_id) + ". "); }
308  }
309 
310  // JOB TYPE: UNKNOWN
311  else {
312  cout << endl
313  << "ERROR: Job " << _id << ": Invalid job type "
314  << job_type << ": Should be either 'pair' or 'site'"
315  << endl;
316  }
317  }
318 
319  ~XJob() {};
320 
321  int getId() { return _id; }
322  string getTag() { return _tag; }
323  int getPairId() { return _pairId; }
324  int getSeg1Id() { return _seg1Id; }
325  int getSeg2Id() { return _seg2Id; }
326  string getMPS1() { return _mps1; }
327  string getMPS2() { return _mps2; }
328  int getSiteId() { return _site_id; }
329  string getType() { return _type; }
330 
331  void setType(string typ, int id) { _type = typ; _site_id = id; }
332  void setIter(int iter) { _iter = iter; }
333  void setSizePol(int size) { _sizePol = size; }
334  void setSizeShell(int size) { _sizeShell = size; }
335  void setEnergy(double E_T, double E_i_i,
336  double E_i_I, double E_I_I, double E_i_O,
337  double E_P, double E_U) {
338  _E_Tot = E_T;
339  _E_Pair_Pair = E_i_i;
340  _E_Pair_Sph1 = E_i_I;
341  _E_Sph1_Sph1 = E_I_I;
342  _E_Pair_Sph2 = E_i_O;
343 
344  _E_PERM = E_P;
345  _E_INDU = E_U;
346  }

351  fprintf(out, "%5d %-20s E_TOT %+4.7f E_PAIR_PAIR %+4.7f"
352  " E_PAIR_CUT1 %+4.7f E_CUT1_CUT1 %+4.7f E_PAIR_CUT2 "

356  _E_Sph1_Sph1, _E_Pair_Sph2, _E_PERM, _E_INDU, _iter,

358  _center.getZ() );
359  }

362  " E_SITE_CUT1 %+4.7f E_CUT1_CUT1 %+4.7f E_SITE_CUT2 "
363  "%+4.7f E_PERM %+4.7f E_INDU %+4.7f ITER %3d"
364  " SPHERE %4d SHELL %4d CENTER %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
365  _id, _tag.c_str(), _E_Tot, _E_Pair_Pair, _E_Pair_Sph1,
366  _E_Sph1_Sph1, _E_Pair_Sph2, _E_PERM, _E_INDU, _iter,
367  _sizePol, _sizeShell, _center.getX(), _center.getY(),
368  _center.getZ() );
369  }

421 
422  class InduWorker : public Thread
423  {
424  public:
425 
426  InduWorker(int id, Topology *top, XMP *master, JobXMP *forker)
427  : _id(id), _top(top), _master(master), _forker(forker)
428  { _actor = XInteractor(top,_master); };
429 
430  ~InduWorker() {};
431 
432  void Run(void) {
433 
434  if (_switch_energy_induce == 1) {
435  while (_forker->NextChunkTodo(_id,1)) {
436  this->InterInduce();
437  _forker->OpenChunks(_chunk1, _chunk2);
438  }
439  }
440  else if (_switch_energy_induce == 0) {
441  while (_forker->NextChunkTodo(_id,0)) {
442  this->InterEnergy();
443  _forker->OpenChunks(_chunk1, _chunk2);
444  }
445  }
446  else {
447  assert(false);
448  }
449 
450 
451  }
452 
453  void InitSpheres(vector< Segment* > *vsegs_cut1,
454  vector< Segment* > *vsegs_cut2,
455  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > *vvpoles_cut1,
456  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > *vvpoles_cut2) {
457  _vsegs_cut1 = vsegs_cut1;
458  _vsegs_cut2 = vsegs_cut2;
459  _vvpoles_cut1 = vvpoles_cut1;
460  _vvpoles_cut2 = vvpoles_cut2;
461 
462  _vvpoles = vvpoles_cut1;
463  }
464 
465  void SetSwitch(int energy_induce) {
466  _switch_energy_induce = energy_induce;
467  if (energy_induce == 0) {
468  _actor.ResetEnergy();
469  _E_Pair_Pair = 0.0;
470  _E_Pair_Sph1 = 0.0;
471  _E_Sph1_Sph1 = 0.0;
472  }
473 
474  }
475 
476  void Setc1c2(int c1, int c2) {
477  _chunk1 = c1;
478  _chunk2 = c2;
479  }
480 
481  void Setnx12ny12(int nx1, int nx2, int ny1, int ny2) {
482  _nx1 = nx1;
483  _nx2 = nx2;
484  _ny1 = ny1;
485  _ny2 = ny2;
486  }
487 
488  void PrintInfo() {
489  printf("%1d : nx1 %2d nx2 %2d ny1 %2d ny2 %2d\n",
490  _id, _nx1, _nx2, _ny1, _ny2);
491  }
492 
493  void InterInduce() {
494 
495  for (int i = _nx1; i < _nx2; ++i) {
496  for (int j = (i >= _ny1) ? i+1 : _ny1; j < _ny2; ++j) {
497 
498  for (pit1 = (*_vvpoles)[i].begin(); pit1 < (*_vvpoles)[i].end(); ++pit1) {
499  for (pit2 = (*_vvpoles)[j].begin(); pit2 < (*_vvpoles)[j].end(); ++pit2) {
500 
501  _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
502  }}
503  }}
504  }
505 
506  double GetEPairPair() { return _E_Pair_Pair; }
507  double GetEPairSph1() { return _E_Pair_Sph1; }
508  double GetESph1Sph1() { return _E_Sph1_Sph1; }
509  XInteractor &GetActor() { return _actor; }
510 
511  void InterEnergy() {
512 
513  for (int i = _nx1; i < _nx2; ++i) {
514  for (int j = (i >= _ny1) ? i+1 : _ny1; j < _ny2; ++j) {
515 
516  // Site-non-site interaction
517  if (this->_forker->_job->getSiteId() == (*_vsegs_cut1)[i]->getId()
518  || this->_forker->_job->getSiteId() == (*_vsegs_cut1)[j]->getId()) {
519 
520  for (pit1 = (*_vvpoles_cut1)[i].begin();
521  pit1 < (*_vvpoles_cut1)[i].end();
522  ++pit1) {
523  for (pit2 = (*_vvpoles_cut1)[j].begin();
524  pit2 < (*_vvpoles_cut1)[j].end();
525  ++pit2) {
526 
527  _E_Pair_Sph1 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
528  }}
529  }
530 
531  // Non-site-non-site interaction
532  else {
533  for (pit1 = (*_vvpoles_cut1)[i].begin();
534  pit1 < (*_vvpoles_cut1)[i].end();
535  ++pit1) {
536  for (pit2 = (*_vvpoles_cut1)[j].begin();
537  pit2 < (*_vvpoles_cut1)[j].end();
538  ++pit2) {
539 
540  _E_Sph1_Sph1 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
541  }}
542  }
543  }}
544  }
545 
546 
547  private:
548 
549  int _id;
550  Topology *_top;
551  XMP *_master;
552  JobXMP *_forker;
553  XInteractor _actor;
554  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > *_vvpoles;
555 
556  vector< Segment* > *_vsegs_cut1;
557  vector< Segment* > *_vsegs_cut2;
558  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > *_vvpoles_cut1;
559  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > *_vvpoles_cut2;
560 
561  int _nx1, _nx2;
562  int _ny1, _ny2;
563  int _chunk1, _chunk2;
564 
565  int _switch_energy_induce;
566 
567  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
568  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
569  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
570  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
571  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
572  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
573 
574  double _E_Pair_Pair;
575  double _E_Pair_Sph1;
576  double _E_Sph1_Sph1;
577 
578  };

581  // Job Operator (Thread class) //
582  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
583 
584  class JobXMP : public Thread
585  {
586  public:
587 
588  JobXMP(int id, Topology *top, XMP *master)
589  : _id(id), _top(top), _master(master)
590  { _actor = XInteractor(top,_master); };
591 
592  ~JobXMP() {};
593 
594  int getId() { return _id; }
595  void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
596 
597  void InitSlotData(Topology *top);
598  void Run(void);
599  void EvalJob(Topology *top, XJob *job);
600 
601  int Induce(int state, XJob *job);
602  double Energy(int state, XJob *job);
603  double EnergyStatic(int state, XJob *job);

605 
606  void ClearTodoTable() {
607  for (int i = 0; i < _xy_done.size(); ++i) {
608  for (int j = 0; j < _xy_done[i].size(); ++j) {
609  _xy_done[i][j] = false;
610  }}
611  }
612 
613  void InitChunks() {
614 
615  _nx1.clear();
616  _nx2.clear();
617  _ny1.clear();
618  _ny2.clear();
619 
620  _xy_done.clear();
621  _chunks_avail.clear();
622 
623 
624  int T = this->_master->_subthreads; // Threads
625  int C = T * 2; // Chunks
626  int N = _polsPolSphere.size(); // Elements
627  int nr = N % C; // Rest size
628  int nt = (N-nr) / C; // Chunk size
629 
630  assert (N == C*nt + nr);
631 
632  for (int id = 0; id < C+1; ++id) {
633  _nx1.push_back( vector<int>(C+1,0) );
634  _nx2.push_back( vector<int>(C+1,0) );
635  _ny1.push_back( vector<int>(C+1,0) );
636  _ny2.push_back( vector<int>(C+1,0) );
637 
638  _xy_done.push_back( vector<bool>(C+1,false) );
639  _chunks_avail.push_back(true);
640  }
641 
642  for (int col = 0; col < C+1; ++col) {
643  for (int row = 0; row < C+1; ++row) {
644 
645  if (col < row) {
646  _nx1[row][col] = 0; _ny1[row][col] = 0;
647  _nx2[row][col] = 0; _ny2[row][col] = 0;
648  }
649  else if (col == C && row == C) {
650  _nx1[row][col] = C*nt;
651  _nx2[row][col] = C*nt + nr;
652  _ny1[row][col] = C*nt;
653  _ny2[row][col] = C*nt + nr;
654  }
655  else if (col == C && row < C) {
656  _nx1[row][col] = row*nt;
657  _nx2[row][col] = (row+1)*nt;
658  _ny1[row][col] = C*nt;
659  _ny2[row][col] = C*nt + nr;
660  }
661  else {
662  _nx1[row][col] = row*nt;
663  _nx2[row][col] = (row+1)*nt;
664  _ny1[row][col] = col*nt;
665  _ny2[row][col] = (col+1)*nt;
666  }
667  }
668  }
669 
670  if (T > 1) {
671  this->_master->_coutMutex.Lock();
672  printf("\n\nTHREAD %1d MESH LOAD: "
673  "NST%1d C%1d N%1d nt%1d nr%1d\n", _id, T, C, N, nt, nr);
674  for (int id = 0; id < C+1; ++id) {
675  for (int run = 0; run < C+1; ++run) {
676  printf("--------+");
677  }
678  printf("\n");
679  for (int run = 0; run < C+1; ++run) {
680  printf("%3d %3d |", _nx1[id][run], _ny1[id][run]);
681  }
682  printf("\n");
683  for (int run = 0; run < C+1; ++run) {
684  printf("%3d %3d |", _nx2[id][run], _ny2[id][run]);
685  }
686  printf("\n");
687  }
688  for (int run = 0; run < C+1; ++run) {
689  printf("--------+");
690  }
691  printf("\n");
692  this->_master->_coutMutex.Unlock();
693  }
694  }
695 
696 
697  void OpenChunks(int c1, int c2) {
698  _chunks_avail[c1] = true;
699  _chunks_avail[c2] = true;
700  }
701 
702  bool NextChunkTodo(int indu_id, int switch_energy_induce) {
703 
704  _alloc_chunk.Lock();
705 
706  bool todo = false;
707 
708  while (true) {
709 
710  for (int i = 0; i < _xy_done.size(); ++i) {
711  for (int j = i; j < _xy_done[i].size(); ++j) {
712  if (!_xy_done[i][j]) {
713  todo = true;
714  if (_chunks_avail[i] && _chunks_avail[j]) {
715 
716  if (switch_energy_induce == 1) {
717  _chunks_avail[i] = false;
718  _chunks_avail[j] = false;
719  }
720 
721  _xy_done[i][j] = true;
722  _indus[indu_id]->Setc1c2(i,j);
723  _indus[indu_id]->Setnx12ny12(_nx1[i][j],
724  _nx2[i][j],
725  _ny1[i][j],
726  _ny2[i][j]);
727 
728  _alloc_chunk.Unlock();
729  return todo;
730  }
731  else { ; }
732  }
733  }}
734 
735  if (!todo) { break; }
736 
737  }
738 
739  _alloc_chunk.Unlock();
740  return todo;
741  }
742 
743 
744 
745 
746  public:
747 
748  int _id;
749  Topology *_top;
750  XMP *_master;
751  XJob *_job;
752 
753  vector< Segment* > _segsPolSphere; // Segments in c/o 0-1
754  vector< Segment* > _segsOutSphere; // Segments in c/0 1-2
755  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsPolSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 0-1
756  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsOutSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 1-2
757  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites; // Copy of top polar sites
758  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites_job; // Adapted to job specs
759  XInteractor _actor;
760 
761  // Manage induction workers
762  vector< InduWorker* > _indus;
763 
764  Mutex _alloc_chunk;
765  vector< bool > _chunks_avail;
766 
767  vector< vector<bool> > _xy_done;
768 
769  vector< vector<int> > _nx1;
770  vector< vector<int> > _nx2;
771  vector< vector<int> > _ny1;
772  vector< vector<int> > _ny2;
773 
774 
775  };

875 
876 void XMP::Initialize(Property *opt) {
877 
878  cout << endl
879  << "... ... Initialized with " << _nThreads << " threads. "
880  << flush;
881 
882  _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
883 
884 
885  string key = "options.xmultipole.multipoles";
886 
887  if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
888  _xml_file = opt->get(key).as< string >();
889  }
890 
891  key = "options.xmultipole.control";
892 
893  if ( opt->exists(key+".job_file")) {
894  _job_file = opt->get(key+".job_file").as<string>();
895  }
896  else {
897  _job_file = opt->get(key+".job_file").as<string>();
898  }
899 
900  if ( opt->exists(key+".emp_file")) {
901  _emp_file = opt->get(key+".emp_file").as<string>();
902  }
903  else {
904  _emp_file = opt->get(key+".emp_file").as<string>();
905  }
906 
907  if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
908  _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
909  _energies2File = true;
910  }
911  else { _energies2File = false; }
912 
913  if (opt->exists(key+".pdb_check")) {
914  _pdb_check = opt->get(key+".pdb_check").as<string>();
915  }
916  else { _pdb_check = ""; }
917 
918  if (opt->exists(key+".write_chk")) {
919  _write_chk_suffix = opt->get(key+".write_chk").as<string>();
920  _write_chk = true;
921  }
922  else { _write_chk = false; }
923 
924  if (opt->exists(key+".format_chk")) {
925  _chk_format = opt->get(key+".format_chk").as<string>();
926  }
927  else { _chk_format = "xyz"; }
928 
929  if (opt->exists(key+".split_dpl")) {
930  _chk_split_dpl = (opt->get(key+".split_dpl").as<int>() == 1) ?
931  true : false;
932  }
933  else { _chk_split_dpl = true; }
934 
935  if (opt->exists(key+".dpl_spacing")) {
936  _chk_dpl_spacing = opt->get(key+".dpl_spacing").as<double>();
937  }
938  else {
939  _chk_dpl_spacing = 1.0e-6;
940  }
941 
942 
943  key = "options.xmultipole.tholemodel";
944 
945  if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
946  int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
947  _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
948  }
949  else { _induce = true; }
950 
951  if ( opt->exists(key+".induce_intra_pair") ) {
952  int induce = opt->get(key+".induce_intra_pair").as< int >();
953  _induce_intra_pair = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
954  }
955  else { _induce_intra_pair = true; }
956

976  }

980  _useScaling = true; }

990  }

1010 void XMP::Collect_XML(string xml_file, Topology *top) {
1011 
1012  cout << endl
1013  << "... ... ... Allocate polar sites to fragments. "
1014  << flush;
1015 
1016  string allocFile = xml_file;
1017 
1018  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1019  // Load polar-site indices from XML //
1020  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1021 
1022  // => Output to maps:
1023  map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
1024  map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
1025  map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_trihedron;
1026  map<string, vector<double> > alloc_frag_weights;
1027 
1028  Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
1029  load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
1030 
1031 
1032  /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
1033  *
1034  * <topology>
1035  *
1036  * <molecules>
1037  * <molecule>
1038  * <name></name>
1039  *
1040  * <segments>
1041  *
1042  * <segment>
1043  * <name>DCV</name>
1044  *
1045  * <map2md></map2md>
1046  *
1047  * <fragments>
1048  * <fragment>
1049  * <name></name>
1050  * <mpoles></mpoles>
1051  * </fragment>
1052  * </fragments>
1053  * ...
1054  * ...
1055  */
1056 
1057 
1058  string key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
1059  list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
1060  list<Property *>::iterator molit;
1061  for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
1062 
1063  string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
1064 
1065  key = "segments.segment";
1066  list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
1067  list<Property *>::iterator segit;
1068 
1069  for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
1070 
1071  string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
1072 
1073  // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
1074  if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
1075  int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
1076  _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
1077  }
1078  else {
1079  _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
1080  }
1081 
1082  key = "fragments.fragment";
1083  list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
1084  list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
1085 
1086  for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
1087 
1088  string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
1089  string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
1090 
1091  string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
1092 
1093  // Local frame for polar sites
1094  vector<int> trihedron_mps;
1095  if ((*fragit)->exists("localframe_mps")) {
1096  cout << endl
1097  << "... ... ... ... " << segName << ": "
1098  << "Defining distinct local frame for polar sites."
1099  << flush;
1100  trihedron_mps = (*fragit)->get("localframe_mps")
1101  .as< vector<int> >();
1102  }
1103  else {
1104  trihedron_mps = (*fragit)->get("localframe")
1105  .as< vector<int> >();
1106  }
1107 
1108  // Mapping weights for polar sites
1109  vector<double> weights_mps;
1110  if ((*fragit)->exists("weights_mps")) {
1111  cout << endl
1112  << "... ... ... ... " << segName << ": "
1113  << "Using distinct weights for polar sites."
1114  << flush;
1115  weights_mps = (*fragit)->get("weights_mps")
1116  .as< vector<double> >();
1117  }
1118  else {
1119  weights_mps = (*fragit)->get("weights")
1120  .as< vector<double> >();
1121  }
1122 
1123  Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
1124  vector<string> mpoleInfo;
1125  tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
1126 
1127  vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
1128  vector<string> mpoleNames;
1129 
1130  vector<string> ::iterator strit;
1131  for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
1132 
1133  Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
1134  vector<string> poleInfo;
1135  tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
1136 
1137  int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
1138  string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
1139 
1140  mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
1141  mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
1142 
1143  }
1144 
1145  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
1146  alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
1147  //alloc_frag_trihedron_mps[mapKeyName] = trihedron_mps;
1148  //alloc_frag_weights_mps[mapKeyName] = weights_mps;
1149  alloc_frag_trihedron[mapKeyName] = trihedron_mps;
1150  alloc_frag_weights[mapKeyName] = weights_mps;
1151  }
1152  }
1153  }
1154 
1155  _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx = alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
1156  _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
1157  //_alloc_frag_trihedron_mps = alloc_frag_trihedron_mps;
1158  //_alloc_frag_weights_mps = alloc_frag_weights_mps;
1159  _alloc_frag_trihedron = alloc_frag_trihedron;
1160  _alloc_frag_weights = alloc_frag_weights;
1161 }

1164 void XMP::Collect_JOB(string job_file, Topology *top) {
1165 
1166  QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
1167 
1168  std::string line;
1169  std::ifstream intt;
1170  intt.open(job_file.c_str());
1171 
1172  if (intt.is_open() ) {
1173  while ( intt.good() ) {
1174 
1175  std::getline(intt, line);
1176  vector<string> split;
1177  Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
1178  toker.ToVector(split);
1179 
1180  if ( !split.size() ||
1181  split[0] == "#" ||
1182  split[0].substr(0,1) == "#" ) { continue; }
1183 
1184 // Sample line
1185 // # JOB_ID TAG PAIR_ID SEG1_ID SEG1_NAME SEG1_MPS SEG2_ID SEG2_NAME SEG2_MPS (TYPE SITE)
1186 // 1 E_CT 3819 182 C60 c60.mps 392 DCV dcv.mps (site 392)
1187 
1188  int jobId = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[0]);
1189  string tag = split[1];
1190  int pairId = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[2]);
1191 
1192  int seg1Id = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[3]);
1193  string seg1Name = split[4];
1194  string seg1mps = split[5];
1195 
1196  int seg2Id = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[6]);
1197  string seg2Name = split[7];
1198  string seg2mps = split[8];
1199 
1200  string job_type = "pair";
1201  int energy_site_id = -1;
1202  if (split.size() == 11) {
1203  job_type = split[9];
1204  energy_site_id = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[10]);
1205  }
1206 
1207  Segment *seg1 = top->getSegment(seg1Id);
1208  Segment *seg2 = top->getSegment(seg2Id);
1209 
1210  _XJobs.push_back(new XJob(jobId, tag, job_type, energy_site_id,
1211  pairId, seg1Id, seg2Id, seg1mps,
1212  seg2mps, top));
1213 
1214  _XJobs.back()->setType(job_type, energy_site_id);
1215 
1216  } /* Exit loop over lines */
1217  }
1218  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << job_file << endl;
1219  throw runtime_error("Please supply input file."); }
1220 
1221  cout << endl
1222  << "... ... ... Registered " << _XJobs.size() << " jobs. "
1223  << flush;
1224 
1225 }

1228 void XMP::Collect_MPS(Topology *top) {
1229 
1230  // +++++++++++++ //
1231  // Parse + Store //
1232  // +++++++++++++ //
1233 
1234  map<int,string> ::iterator misit;
1235 
1236  // Neutral species
1237  for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_n.begin();
1238  misit != _segId_mpsFile_n.end();
1239  ++misit) {
1240  if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
1241  else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, 0); }
1242  }
1243 
1244  // Anion
1245  for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_e.begin();
1246  misit != _segId_mpsFile_e.end();
1247  ++misit) {
1248  if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
1249  else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, -1); }
1250  }
1251 
1252  // Cation
1253  for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_h.begin();
1254  misit != _segId_mpsFile_h.end();
1255  ++misit) {
1256  if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
1257  else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, +1); }
1258  }
1259 
1260 
1261  // Job Seg1 Seg2
1262  vector<XJob*> :: iterator jit;
1263  for (jit = _XJobs.begin();
1264  jit < _XJobs.end();
1265  ++jit) {
1266 
1267  string mpsfile1 = (*jit)->getMPS1();
1268  string mpsfile2 = (*jit)->getMPS2();
1269 
1270  if (_mpsFile_pSites_job.count(mpsfile1) > 0 ) { ; }
1271  else { _mpsFile_pSites_job[mpsfile1] = Parse_GDMA(mpsfile1, 0); }
1272 
1273  if (_mpsFile_pSites_job.count(mpsfile2) > 0 ) { ; }
1274  else { _mpsFile_pSites_job[mpsfile2] = Parse_GDMA(mpsfile2, 0); }
1275 
1276  }
1277 
1278 // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator it;
1279 // for (it = _mpsFile_pSites_job.begin();
1280 // it != _mpsFile_pSites_job.end();
1281 // ++it) {
1282 // cout << endl << "KEY_" << it->first << flush;
1283 // }
1284 
1285 
1286  cout << endl
1287  << "... ... ... Parsed " << _mpsFile_pSites.size()
1288  << " .mps files from " << _emp_file
1289  << ", " << _mpsFile_pSites_job.size()
1290  << " .mps files from " << _job_file
1291  << flush;
1292 }

1295 void XMP::Collect_EMP(string emp_file, Topology *top) {
1296 
1297  std::string line;
1298  std::ifstream intt;
1299  intt.open(emp_file.c_str());
1300 
1301  if (intt.is_open() ) {
1302  while ( intt.good() ) {
1303 
1304  std::getline(intt, line);
1305  vector<string> split;
1306  Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
1307  toker.ToVector(split);
1308 
1309  if ( !split.size() ||
1310  split[0] == "#" ||
1311  split[0].substr(0,1) == "#" ) { continue; }
1312 
1313  // Line sample:
1314  // 1022 C60 C60_n.mps C60_e.mps C60_h.mps
1315 
1316  int segId = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[0]);
1317  string segName = boost::lexical_cast<string>(split[1]);
1318 
1319  // Some compliance checks
1320  assert( split.size() == 5 ); // <- File format correct?
1321  assert( top->getSegment(segId)->getName() == segName ); // <- Input matches topology?
1322 
1323  _segId_mpsFile_n[segId] = split[2];
1324  _segId_mpsFile_e[segId] = split[3];
1325  _segId_mpsFile_h[segId] = split[4];
1326 
1327  } // Exit loop over lines
1328  }
1329  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << emp_file << endl; }
1330 
1331  assert( _segId_mpsFile_n.size() == top->Segments().size() ); // <- Input for all segments?
1332 
1333 }

1335 
1336 void XMP::Create_MPOLS(Topology *top) {
1337 
1338  // Warning: Direct mapping of k > 0 multipoles to MD coordinates
1339  bool print_huge_map2md_warning = false;
1340 
1341  // Log warning: Symmetry = 1 and k > 0 multipoles.
1342  map<string,bool> warned_symm_idkey;
1343 
1344  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1345  // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
1346  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
1347 
1348  vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
1349  for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
1350  sit < top->Segments().end();
1351  ++sit) {
1352 
1353  Segment *seg = *sit;
1354  int segId = seg->getId();
1355 
1356  bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
1357 
1358  string mps_n = _segId_mpsFile_n[segId];
1359  string mps_h = _segId_mpsFile_h[segId];
1360  string mps_e = _segId_mpsFile_e[segId];
1361 
1362  vector<PolarSite*> pols_n = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_n];
1363  vector<PolarSite*> pols_h = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_h];
1364  vector<PolarSite*> pols_e = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_e];
1365 
1366  // Merge polar sites
1367  assert(pols_n.size() == pols_h.size());
1368  assert(pols_n.size() == pols_e.size());
1369 
1370  for (int i = 0; i < pols_n.size(); i++) {
1371  pols_n[i]->setQs( pols_h[i]->getQs(+1), +1 );
1372  pols_n[i]->setPs( pols_h[i]->getPs(+1), +1 );
1373  }
1374  for (int i = 0; i < pols_n.size(); ++i) {
1375  pols_n[i]->setQs(pols_e[i]->getQs(-1), -1 );
1376  pols_n[i]->setPs(pols_e[i]->getPs(-1), -1 );
1377  }
1378 
1379  vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
1380  for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
1381  fit < seg->Fragments().end();
1382  ++fit) {
1383 
1384  Fragment *frag = *fit;
1385 
1386  // Retrieve polar-site data for this fragment
1387  string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
1388  + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
1389  vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
1390  vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
1391  vector<double> weightsInFrag = _alloc_frag_weights.at(idkey);
1392 
1393  if (map2md && polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
1394  cout << endl
1395  << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName()
1396  << " Fragment " << frag->getName()
1397  << ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar "
1398  << "sites as there are atoms to perform mapping. "
1399  << endl;
1400  throw runtime_error("Check mapping or switch to map2md = 0");
1401  }
1402 
1403  matrix rotateMP2MD;
1404  vec translateMP2MD;
1405 
1406  // Determine transformation matrices to execute mapping
1407  if (!map2md) {
1408 
1409  vector<PolarSite*> trihedron_pol;
1410  vector<Atom*> trihedron_atm;
1411 
1412  vector<int> trihedron_ints = _alloc_frag_trihedron.at(idkey);
1413  vector<int> ::iterator iit;
1414  for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
1415  iit < trihedron_ints.end();
1416  ++iit) {
1417  trihedron_pol.push_back(pols_n[(*iit)-1]);
1418  }
1419 
1420  trihedron_ints = frag->getTrihedron();
1421  for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
1422  iit < trihedron_ints.end();
1423  ++iit) {
1424  vector< Atom* > ::iterator ait;
1425  for (ait = frag->Atoms().begin();
1426  ait < frag->Atoms().end();
1427  ++ait) {
1428  if ((*ait)->getQMId() == (*iit)) {
1429  trihedron_atm.push_back(*ait);
1430  }
1431  }
1432  }
1433 
1434 
1435  int symmetry = trihedron_pol.size();
1436  assert (trihedron_pol.size() <= trihedron_atm.size() );
1437 
1438  vec xMD, yMD, zMD;
1439  vec xQM, yQM, zQM;
1440 
1441  if (symmetry == 3) {
1442  vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
1443  vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
1444  vec r3MD = trihedron_atm[2]->getPos();
1445  vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
1446  vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
1447  vec r3QM = trihedron_pol[2]->getPos();
1448 
1449  xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
1450  yMD = r3MD - r1MD;
1451  xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
1452  yQM = r3QM - r1QM;
1453 
1454  zMD = xMD ^ yMD;
1455  zQM = xQM ^ yQM;
1456 
1457  yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
1458  yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
1459 
1460  xMD = xMD.normalize();
1461  yMD = yMD.normalize();
1462  zMD = zMD.normalize();
1463  xQM = xQM.normalize();
1464  yQM = yQM.normalize();
1465  zQM = zQM.normalize();
1466  }
1467 
1468  else if (symmetry == 2) {
1469 
1470  vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
1471  vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
1472  vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
1473  vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
1474 
1475  xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
1476  xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
1477 
1478  // Normalising not necessary, but recommendable, when doing...
1479  xMD = xMD.normalize();
1480  xQM = xQM.normalize();
1481 
1482  vec yMDtmp = vec(0,0,0);
1483  vec yQMtmp = vec(0,0,0);
1484 
1485  // ... this: Check whether one of the components is equal or close to
1486  // zero. If so, this easily gives a second leg for the trihedron.
1487  if ( xMD.getX()*xMD.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
1488  else if ( xMD.getY()*xMD.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
1489  else if ( xMD.getZ()*xMD.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
1490  if ( xQM.getX()*xQM.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
1491  else if ( xQM.getY()*xQM.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
1492  else if ( xQM.getZ()*xQM.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
1493 
1494  if ( abs(yMDtmp) < 0.5 ) {
1495  // All components of xMD are unequal to zero => division is safe.
1496  // Choose vector from plane with xMD * inPlaneVec = 0:
1497  double tmp_x = 1.;
1498  double tmp_y = 1.;
1499  double tmp_z = 1/xMD.getZ() * (-xMD.getX()*tmp_x - xMD.getY()*tmp_y);
1500  yMDtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
1501  yMDtmp.normalize();
1502  }
1503  if ( abs(yQMtmp) < 0.5 ) {
1504  double tmp_x = 1.;
1505  double tmp_y = 1.;
1506  double tmp_z = 1/xQM.getZ() * (-xQM.getX()*tmp_x - xQM.getY()*tmp_y);
1507  yQMtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
1508  yQMtmp.normalize();
1509  }
1510 
1511  // Now proceed as for symmetry 3
1512  zMD = xMD ^ yMDtmp;
1513  yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
1514  zQM = xQM ^ yQMtmp;
1515  yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
1516 
1517  xMD.normalize();
1518  yMD.normalize();
1519  zMD.normalize();
1520  xQM.normalize();
1521  yQM.normalize();
1522  zQM.normalize();
1523  }
1524 
1525  else if (symmetry == 1) {
1526 
1527  if (!warned_symm_idkey[idkey]) {
1528  cout << endl << "... ... ... "
1529  << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
1530  << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
1531  << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
1532  << flush;
1533  warned_symm_idkey[idkey] = true;
1534  }
1535 
1536  xMD = vec(1,0,0);
1537  yMD = vec(0,1,0);
1538  zMD = vec(0,0,1);
1539  xQM = vec(1,0,0);
1540  yQM = vec(0,1,0);
1541  zQM = vec(0,0,1);
1542  }
1543 
1544  else {
1545  cout << endl
1546  << "NOTE: Invalid definition of local frame in fragment "
1547  << frag->getName();
1548  cout << ". Assuming point particle for mapping. "
1549  << endl;
1550  cout << endl
1551  << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
1552  << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
1553  << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
1554  << endl;
1555 
1556  xMD = vec(1,0,0);
1557  yMD = vec(0,1,0);
1558  zMD = vec(0,0,1);
1559  xQM = vec(1,0,0);
1560  yQM = vec(0,1,0);
1561  zQM = vec(0,0,1);
1562  }
1563 
1564  matrix rotMD = matrix(xMD, yMD, zMD);
1565  matrix rotMP = matrix(xQM, yQM, zQM);
1566 
1567  rotateMP2MD = rotMD * rotMP.Transpose();
1568 
1569 
1570  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
1571  // Transform fragment //
1572  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
1573 
1574 
1575  vec CoMP = vec(0.,0.,0.);
1576  double W = 0.0;
1577  for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
1578 
1579  double weight = weightsInFrag[i];
1580 
1581  vec pos = pols_n[polesInFrag[i]-1]->getPos();
1582 
1583  CoMP += weight*pos;
1584  W += weight;
1585 
1586  }
1587  CoMP /= W;
1588 
1589  translateMP2MD = frag->getCoMD() - CoMP;
1590 
1591  }
1592 
1593  // Create polar sites
1594  for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
1595 
1596  string name = namesInFrag[i];
1597  int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
1598 
1599  PolarSite *templ = pols_n[poleId-1];
1600  PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
1601  newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
1602  seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
1603  frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
1604 
1605  // Shift + rotate
1606  if (!map2md) {
1607  newSite->Translate(translateMP2MD);
1608  newSite->Rotate(rotateMP2MD, frag->getCoMD());
1609  }
1610  else {
1611  vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
1612  newSite->setPos(mdpos);
1613  if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
1614  print_huge_map2md_warning = true;
1615  }
1616  }
1617  }
1618  }
1619  }
1620 
1621  if (print_huge_map2md_warning) {
1622  cout << endl << endl
1623  << "**************************************************************"
1624  << "WARNING: MAP2MD = TRUE while using higher-rank multipoles can "
1625  << "mess up the orientation of those multipoles if the coordinate "
1626  << "frame used in the .mps file does not agree with the global MD "
1627  << "frame. If you know what you are doing - proceed ... "
1628  << "**************************************************************"
1629  << endl;
1630  }
1631 
1632  top->setIsEStatified(true);
1633 
1634 }

1637 vector<PolarSite*> XMP::Map_MPols_To_Seg(vector<PolarSite*> &pols_n, Segment *seg) {
1638 
1639  bool print_huge_map2md_warning = false;
1640 
1641  vector<PolarSite*> return_pols;
1642  return_pols.reserve(pols_n.size());
1643 
1644  int segId = seg->getId();
1645  bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
1646 
1647  vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
1648  for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
1649  fit < seg->Fragments().end();
1650  ++fit) {
1651 
1652  Fragment *frag = *fit;
1653 
1654  // Retrieve polar-site data for this fragment
1655  string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
1656  + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
1657  vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
1658  vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
1659  vector<double> weightsInFrag= _alloc_frag_weights.at(idkey);
1660 
1661  if (map2md && polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
1662  cout << endl
1663  << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName()
1664  << " Fragment " << frag->getName()
1665  << ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar "
1666  << "sites as there are atoms to perform mapping. "
1667  << endl;
1668  throw runtime_error("Check mapping or switch to map2md = 0");
1669  }
1670 
1671  matrix rotateMP2MD;
1672  vec translateMP2MD;
1673 
1674  // Determine transformation matrices to execute mapping
1675  if (!map2md) {
1676 
1677  vector<PolarSite*> trihedron_pol;
1678  vector<Atom*> trihedron_atm;
1679 
1680  vector<int> trihedron_ints = _alloc_frag_trihedron.at(idkey);
1681  vector<int> ::iterator iit;
1682  for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
1683  iit < trihedron_ints.end();
1684  ++iit) {
1685  trihedron_pol.push_back(pols_n[(*iit)-1]);

1689  for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
1690  iit < trihedron_ints.end();

1694  ait < frag->Atoms().end();
1695  ++ait) {
1696  if ((*ait)->getQMId() == (*iit)) {
1697  trihedron_atm.push_back(*ait);
1698  }
1699  }
1700  }
1701 
1702  int symmetry = trihedron_pol.size();
1703  assert (trihedron_pol.size() <= trihedron_atm.size() );
1704 
1705  vec xMD, yMD, zMD;
1706  vec xQM, yQM, zQM;
1707 
1708  if (symmetry == 3) {
1709  vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
1710  vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
1711  vec r3MD = trihedron_atm[2]->getPos();
1712  vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
1713  vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
1714  vec r3QM = trihedron_pol[2]->getPos();
1715 
1716  xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
1717  yMD = r3MD - r1MD;
1718  xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
1719  yQM = r3QM - r1QM;
1720 
1721  zMD = xMD ^ yMD;
1722  zQM = xQM ^ yQM;
1723 
1724  yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
1725  yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
1726 
1727  xMD = xMD.normalize();
1728  yMD = yMD.normalize();
1729  zMD = zMD.normalize();
1730  xQM = xQM.normalize();
1731  yQM = yQM.normalize();
1732  zQM = zQM.normalize();
1733  }
1734 
1735  else if (symmetry == 2) {
1736 
1737  vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
1738  vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
1739  vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
1740  vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
1741 
1742  xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
1743  xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
1744 
1745  // Normalising not necessary, but recommendable, when doing...
1746  xMD = xMD.normalize();
1747  xQM = xQM.normalize();
1748 
1749  vec yMDtmp = vec(0,0,0);
1750  vec yQMtmp = vec(0,0,0);
1751 
1752  // ... this: Check whether one of the components is equal or close to
1753  // zero. If so, this easily gives a second leg for the trihedron.
1754  if ( xMD.getX()*xMD.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
1755  else if ( xMD.getY()*xMD.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
1756  else if ( xMD.getZ()*xMD.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
1757  if ( xQM.getX()*xQM.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
1758  else if ( xQM.getY()*xQM.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
1759  else if ( xQM.getZ()*xQM.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
1760 
1761  if ( abs(yMDtmp) < 0.5 ) {
1762  // All components of xMD are unequal to zero => division is safe.
1763  // Choose vector from plane with xMD * inPlaneVec = 0:
1764  double tmp_x = 1.;
1765  double tmp_y = 1.;
1766  double tmp_z = 1/xMD.getZ() * (-xMD.getX()*tmp_x - xMD.getY()*tmp_y);
1767  yMDtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
1768  yMDtmp.normalize();
1769  }
1770  if ( abs(yQMtmp) < 0.5 ) {
1771  double tmp_x = 1.;
1772  double tmp_y = 1.;
1773  double tmp_z = 1/xQM.getZ() * (-xQM.getX()*tmp_x - xQM.getY()*tmp_y);
1774  yQMtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
1775  yQMtmp.normalize();
1776  }
1777 
1778  // Now proceed as for symmetry 3
1779  zMD = xMD ^ yMDtmp;
1780  yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
1781  zQM = xQM ^ yQMtmp;
1782  yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
1783 
1784  xMD.normalize();
1785  yMD.normalize();
1786  zMD.normalize();
1787  xQM.normalize();
1788  yQM.normalize();
1789  zQM.normalize();
1790  }
1791 
1792  else if (symmetry == 1) {
1793 
1794  //cout << endl
1795  // << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
1796  // << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
1797  // << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
1798  // << endl;
1799 
1800  xMD = vec(1,0,0);
1801  yMD = vec(0,1,0);
1802  zMD = vec(0,0,1);
1803  xQM = vec(1,0,0);
1804  yQM = vec(0,1,0);
1805  zQM = vec(0,0,1);
1806  }
1807 
1808  else {
1809  cout << endl
1810  << "NOTE: Invalid definition of local frame in fragment "
1811  << frag->getName();
1812  cout << ". Assuming point particle for mapping. "
1813  << endl;
1814  cout << endl
1815  << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
1816  << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
1817  << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
1818  << endl;
1819 
1820  xMD = vec(1,0,0);
1821  yMD = vec(0,1,0);
1822  zMD = vec(0,0,1);
1823  xQM = vec(1,0,0);
1824  yQM = vec(0,1,0);
1825  zQM = vec(0,0,1);
1826  }
1827 
1828  matrix rotMD = matrix(xMD, yMD, zMD);
1829  matrix rotMP = matrix(xQM, yQM, zQM);
1830 
1831  rotateMP2MD = rotMD * rotMP.Transpose();
1832 
1833 
1834  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
1835  // Transform fragment //
1836  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
1837 
1838 
1839  vec CoMP = vec(0.,0.,0.);
1840  double W = 0.0;
1841  for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
1842 
1843  double weight = weightsInFrag[i];
1844 
1845  vec pos = pols_n[polesInFrag[i]-1]->getPos();
1846 
1847  CoMP += weight*pos;
1848  W += weight;
1849 
1850  }
1851  CoMP /= W;
1852 
1853  translateMP2MD = frag->getCoMD() - CoMP;
1854 
1855  }
1856 
1857  // Create polar sites
1858  for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
1859 
1860  string name = namesInFrag[i];
1861  int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
1862 
1863  PolarSite *templ = pols_n[poleId-1];
1864  PolarSite *newSite = new PolarSite(-1, name);
1865  newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
1866 
1867  // Shift + rotate
1868  if (!map2md) {
1869  newSite->Translate(translateMP2MD);
1870  newSite->Rotate(rotateMP2MD, frag->getCoMD());
1871  }
1872  else {
1873  vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
1874  newSite->setPos(mdpos);
1875  if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
1876  print_huge_map2md_warning = true;
1877  }
1878  }
1879 
1880  newSite->Charge(0);
1881 
1882  return_pols.push_back(newSite);
1883 
1884  }
1885  } // End loop over fragments
1886 
1887  if (print_huge_map2md_warning) {

1889  << "**************************************************************"
1890  << "WARNING: MAP2MD = TRUE while using higher-rank multipoles can "
1891  << "mess up the orientation of those multipoles if the coordinate "
1892  << "frame used in the .mps file does not agree with the global MD "
1893  << "frame. If you know what you are doing - proceed ... "
1894  << "**************************************************************"
1895  << endl;
1896  }
1897 
1898  return return_pols;
1899 }

1901 
1902 vector<PolarSite*> XMP::Parse_GDMA(string filename, int state) {
1903 
1904  int poleCount = 1;
1905  double Q0_total = 0.0;
1906  string units = "";
1907  bool useDefaultPs = true;
1908 
1909  vector<PolarSite*> poles;
1910  PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
1911 
1912  vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
1913  double P1; // <- dipole polarizability
1914 
1915  std::string line;
1916  std::ifstream intt;
1917  intt.open(filename.c_str());
1918 
1919  if (intt.is_open() ) {
1920  while ( intt.good() ) {
1921 
1922  std::getline(intt, line);
1923  vector<string> split;
1924  Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
1925  toker.ToVector(split);
1926 
1927  if ( !split.size() ||
1928  split[0] == "!" ||
1929  split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
1930 
1931  // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
1932  // ! DCV2T opt
1933  // ! SP RB3LYP 6-311+G(d,p)
1934  // Units bohr
1935  //
1936  // C -4.2414603400 -3.8124751600 0.0017575736 Rank 2
1937  // -0.3853409355
1938  // -0.0002321905 0.2401559510 0.6602334308
1939  // -0.7220625314 0.0004894995 -0.0003833545 0.4526409813 -0.50937399
1940  // P 1.75
1941 
1942 
1943  // Units used
1944  if ( split[0] == "Units") {
1945  units = split[1];
1946  if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
1947  throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
1948  + filename + " not supported.");
1949  }
1950  }
1951 
1952  // element, position, rank limit
1953  else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
1954 
1955  Qs.clear();
1956  P1 = -1.;
1957 
1958  int id = poleCount++; // <- starts from 1
1959  string name = split[0];
1960 
1961  double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
1962  double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
1963  double x, y, z;
1964 
1965  if (units == "bohr") {
1966  x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
1967  y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
1968  z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
1969  }
1970  else if (units == "angstrom") {
1971  x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
1972  y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
1973  z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
1974  }
1975  else {
1976  throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
1977  + filename + " not supported.");
1978  }
1979 
1980  vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
1981 
1982  int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
1983 
1984  PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
1985  newPole->setRank(rank);
1986  newPole->setPos(pos);
1987  poles.push_back(newPole);
1988  thisPole = newPole;
1989 
1990  }
1991 
1992  // 'P', dipole polarizability
1993  else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
1994  P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
1995  thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
1996  useDefaultPs = false;
1997  }
1998 
1999  // multipole line
2000  else {
2001 
2002  int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
2003 
2004  if (lineRank == 0) {
2005  Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
2006  }
2007 
2008  for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
2009 
2010  double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
2011 
2012  // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
2013  double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
2014  qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
2015 
2016  Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
2017 
2018  }
2019  thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
2020  }
2021 
2022  } /* Exit loop over lines */
2023  }
2024  else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl;
2025  throw runtime_error("Please supply input file."); }
2026 
2027 
2028  printf("\n... ... ... Reading %-25s -> Q0(Sum) = %+1.3f ",
2029  filename.c_str(), Q0_total);
2030 
2031  if (useDefaultPs) {
2032 
2033  cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
2034  << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
2035 
2036  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
2037  for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
2038  string elem = (*pol)->getName();
2039  double alpha = 0.0;
2040  // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
2041  if (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3; } // <- conversion from
2042  else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } // A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
2043  else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
2044  else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
2045  else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
2046  // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
2047  //if (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
2048  //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } // A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
2049  //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
2050  //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
2051  //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
2052  else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
2053  "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
2054  (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
2055  }
2056  }
2057 
2058  return poles;
2059 }

2061 
2062 bool XMP::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
2063 
2064  cout << endl
2065  << "... ... Load multipole definition, collect jobs: "
2066  << flush;
2067 
2068  Collect_XML(_xml_file, top); // <- Allocate polar sites to fragments
2069  Collect_EMP(_emp_file, top); // <- Collect segs .mps => Background .mps
2070  Collect_JOB(_job_file, top); // <- Collect jobs .mps => Foreground .mps
2071  Collect_MPS(top); // <- Parse all .mps files (fore-, background)
2072 
2073 
2074  // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
2075  // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
2076  // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
2077 
2078  // Rigidify segments, fragments
2079  if (!top->isRigid()) {
2080  bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
2081  if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
2082  }
2083  else {
2084  cout << endl
2085  << "... ... System is already rigidified.";
2086  }
2087 
2088  // Create polar sites
2089  if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
2090  this->Create_MPOLS(top);
2091  cout << endl
2092  << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
2093  << " multipole sites. "
2094  << flush;
2095  }
2096  else {
2097  cout << endl
2098  << "... ... System is already estatified. "
2099  << "This prohibits running XMultipole. "
2100  << flush;
2101  }
2102 
2103  // To check rotation into global frame
2104  if (_pdb_check != "") {
2105  cout << endl
2106  << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
2107  << _pdb_check << ". "
2108  << flush;
2109 
2110  string mpNAME = _pdb_check;
2111  FILE *mpPDB = NULL;
2112  mpPDB = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
2113 
2114  vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
2115  for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
2116  sit < top->Segments().end();
2117  ++sit) {
2118  (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
2119  }
2120  fclose(mpPDB);
2121  }
2122 
2123 
2124  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2125  // Create + start threads (Job Ops) //
2126  // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2127 
2128  // Convert threads into subthreads if beneficial
2129  if (_XJobs.size() < _nThreads) {
2130  _subthreads = (_nThreads - _XJobs.size()) / _XJobs.size() + 1;
2131  _nThreads = _XJobs.size();
2132 
2133  cout << endl << "... ... "
2134  << "Converted threads into subthreads to increase efficiency: "
2135  << "NT = " << _nThreads << ", NST = " << _subthreads
2136  << flush;
2137  }
2138 
2139  vector<JobXMP*> jobOps;
2140 
2141  _nextXJob = _XJobs.begin();
2142 
2143  for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
2144  JobXMP *newOp = new JobXMP(id, top, this);
2145  jobOps.push_back(newOp);
2146  }
2147 
2148  for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
2149  jobOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
2150  }
2151 
2152  for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
2153  jobOps[id]->Start();
2154  }
2155 
2156  for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
2157  jobOps[id]->WaitDone();
2158  }
2159 
2160  for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
2161  delete jobOps[id];
2162  }
2163 
2164  jobOps.clear();
2165 
2166 
2167  FILE *out;
2168  out = fopen(this->_outFile.c_str(), "w");
2169  vector<XJob*> :: iterator jit;
2170  for (jit = _XJobs.begin(); jit < _XJobs.end(); ++jit) {
2171  (*jit)->WriteInfoLine(out);
2172  }
2173  fclose(out);
2174 
2175  return true;
2176 
2177 }

2186 void XMP::JobXMP::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
2187 
2188  vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
2189  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
2190  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
2191  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
2192 
2193  _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
2194  assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
2195 
2196  for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
2197  sitRef < top->Segments().end();
2198  ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
2199 
2200  (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
2201 
2202  for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
2203  pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
2204  pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
2205  ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
2206 
2207  *pitNew = new PolarSite();
2208  (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
2209  (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
2210  }
2211  }
2212 }

2215 void XMP::JobXMP::Run(void) {
2216 
2217  while (true) {
2218  _job = _master->RequestNextJob(_id, _top);
2219 
2220  if (_job == NULL) { break; }
2221  else { this->EvalJob(_top, _job); }
2222  }
2223 }

2314 // job->Seg2()->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
2315 // fclose(out);

2319  // (De-)polarize, charge to N //

2340  (*pit)->Depolarize();
2341  (*pit)->Charge(0); // <- Not necessarily neutral state

2345  for (sit = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {

2347  (*pit)->Depolarize();
2348  (*pit)->Charge(0); // <- Not necessarily neutral state

2357  InduWorker *newIndu = new InduWorker(id,this->_top,this->_master,this);

2359  newIndu->InitSpheres(&_segsPolSphere,&_segsOutSphere,
2360  &_polsPolSphere,&_polsOutSphere);
2361  newIndu->SetSwitch(1);

2399  out = fopen(chk_file.c_str(), "w");
2400

2402  int pcount = 0;
2403

2405  if (job->getType() == "pair") {

2407

2416  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
2417  ++pit, ++pcount) {

2419  }
2420  }
2421  }
2422  }
2423  else {
2424 
2425  if (job->getSiteId() == job->getSeg2Id()) {
2426  // Reverse order
2427  for (sit = _segsPolSphere.end() - 1; sit > _segsPolSphere.begin(); --sit) {
2428 
2429  int segId = (*sit)->getId();
2430 
2431  if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {
2432 
2433  vec pb_shift = job->Center() - (*sit)->getPos()
2434  - top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), job->Center());
2435

2437  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
2438  ++pit, ++pcount) {
2439  if (segId == job->getSiteId()) {
2440  (*pit)->WriteXyzLine(out, pb_shift, _master->_chk_format);
2441  }
2442  else {
2443  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, pb_shift,
2444  _master->_chk_split_dpl,
2445  _master->_chk_format,
2446  _master->_chk_dpl_spacing);
2447  }
2448  }
2449  }
2450  }
2451  }
2452  else if (job->getSiteId() == job->getSeg1Id()) {
2453  for (sit = _segsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
2454 
2455  int segId = (*sit)->getId();
2456 
2457  if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {
2458 
2459  vec pb_shift = job->Center() - (*sit)->getPos()
2460  - top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), job->Center());
2461 
2462  for (pit = _polarSites_job[segId-1].begin();
2463  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
2464  ++pit, ++pcount) {
2465  if (segId == job->getSiteId()) {
2466  (*pit)->WriteXyzLine(out, pb_shift, _master->_chk_format);
2467  }
2468  else {
2469  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, pb_shift,
2470  _master->_chk_split_dpl,
2471  _master->_chk_format,
2472  _master->_chk_dpl_spacing);
2473  }
2474  }
2475  }
2476  }
2477  }
2478  else {

2480  job->getSiteId(), job->getId());
2481  throw std::runtime_error("Redo job input.");
2482  }
2483 
2484 
2485  }
2486 
2487 
2488  if (_master->_chk_format == "gaussian" && job->getType() == "pair") {
2489  fprintf(out, "\n");
2490  }
2491 
2492  // Save induction state of polarization sphere
2493  for (sit = _segsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
2494 
2495  int segId = (*sit)->getId();
2496 
2497  if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {
2498  continue;
2499  }
2500 
2501  vec pb_shift = job->Center() - (*sit)->getPos()
2502  - top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), job->Center());
2503 
2504 
2505  for (pit = _polarSites_job[segId-1].begin();
2506  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
2507  ++pit, ++pcount) {
2508  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, pb_shift,
2509  _master->_chk_split_dpl,
2510  _master->_chk_format,
2511  _master->_chk_dpl_spacing);
2512  }
2513  }

2517

2519 
2520  if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {

2522  assert(false); // Central pair in outer shell? No!
2523  }
2524  else if (job->getType() == "site") {
2525  assert(segId != job->getSiteId()); // Central site in outer shell? No!
2526  }
2527  }
2528 
2529  vec pb_shift = job->Center() - (*sit)->getPos()
2530  - top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), job->Center());
2531 
2532  for (pit = _polarSites_job[segId-1].begin();
2533  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
2534  ++pit, ++pcount) {

2536  false,

2553  for (cleanit = subs2.begin(); cleanit < subs2.end(); ++cleanit) {

2557  subs2.clear();
2558

2561 
2562 int XMP::JobXMP::Induce(int state, XJob *job) {
2563 
2564  for (int id = 0; id < _master->_subthreads; ++id) {
2565  _indus[id]->SetSwitch(1);
2566  }
2567 
2568  double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
2569  double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
2570  int maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
2571 
2572  // Intra-pair induction ...
2573  bool induce_intra_pair = this->_master->_induce_intra_pair;
2574  // ... change this for jobs of type "site":
2575  if (job->getType() == "site") { induce_intra_pair = true; }
2576 
2577  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
2578  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
2579  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
2580  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
2581  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
2582  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
2583 
2584  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2585  // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
2586  // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2587 
2588 // cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
2589  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
2590  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2591  ++sit1, ++seg1) {
2592  for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
2593  sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2594  ++sit2, ++seg2) {
2595 
2596  // Intra-pair permanent induction field?
2597  if ( !induce_intra_pair ) {
2598  if ( ( (*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id()
2599  || (*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id() )
2600  && ( (*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id()
2601  || (*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id() )) {
2602  continue;
2603  }
2604  }
2605 
2606  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2607  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2608 
2609  _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2610  }}
2611  }}
2612 
2613  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
2614  // 1st-order induction //
2615  // +++++++++++++++++++ //
2616 
2617 // cout << " | Induce " << endl;
2618  if (!job->StartFromCPT()) { // OVERRIDE
2619  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2620  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2621  ++sit1) {
2622 
2623  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2624  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
2625  }
2626  }
2627  }
2628  else {
2629  assert(false); // Load induced dipole moments from file
2630  }
2631 
2632 
2633 
2634  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2635  // Higher-order induction //
2636  // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
2637 
2638 
2639  int iter = 0;
2640 // boost::progress_timer T;
2641  for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
2642 
2643  // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
2644 // cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
2645  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2646  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2647  ++sit1) {
2648 
2649  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2650  (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
2651  }
2652  }
2653 
2654  // Intra-site contribution to induction field
2655 // cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
2656  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2657  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2658  ++sit1) {
2659 
2660  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2661  for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
2662 
2663  _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2)); // <- Intra-pair => zero out
2664  }}
2665  }
2666 
2667  // Inter-site contribution to induction field
2668 // cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
2669  //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
2670 // T.restart();
2671 
2672  // >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2673 
2674 // for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2675 // sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2676 // ++sit1) {
2677 // for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
2678 // sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2679 // ++sit2) {
2680 //
2681 // for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2682 // for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2683 //
2684 // _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2)); // <- Pair-environment => figure sth out
2685 // }}
2686 // }}
2687 
2688  for (int id = 0; id < this->_master->_subthreads; ++id) {
2689  _indus[id]->Start();
2690  }
2691 
2692  for (int id = 0; id < this->_master->_subthreads; ++id) {
2693  _indus[id]->WaitDone();
2694  }
2695 
2696  this->ClearTodoTable();
2697 
2698  // <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2699 // cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
2700 
2701  // Induce again
2702 // cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
2703  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2704  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2705  ++sit1) {
2706 
2707  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2708  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR); // <- Okay if alpha = 0
2709  }
2710  }
2711 
2712  // Check for convergence
2713 // cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
2714  bool converged = true;
2715  double maxdU = -1;
2716  double avgdU = 0.0;
2717  int baseN = 0;
2718  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
2719  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2720  ++sit1) {
2721 
2722  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2723  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
2724  avgdU += dU;
2725  ++baseN;
2726  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
2727  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
2728  }
2729  }
2730  avgdU /= baseN;
2731  if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
2732 
2733 // cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
2734 // << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
2735 // << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
2736 
2737  // Break if converged
2738  if (converged) {
2739  break;
2740  }
2741  else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
2742  this->_master->LockCout();
2743  cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for job "
2744  << job->getId() << " did not converge to precision: "
2745  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
2746  this->_master->UnlockCout();
2747  break;
2748  }
2749  }
2750 
2751  return iter;
2752 
2753 // cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
2754 // << " - wSOR " << wSOR
2755 // << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
2756 }

2759 double XMP::JobXMP::Energy(int state, XJob *job) {
2760 
2761  double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
2762 
2763  // PAIR/SITE <-> SPH1 <-> SPH2 //
2764 
2765  _actor.ResetEnergy();
2766  double E_Tot = 0.0;
2767  double E_Pair_Pair = 0.0; // <- Pair-Pair interaction permanent + induced
2768  double E_Pair_Sph1 = 0.0; // <- Pair-Sph1 interaction permanent + induced
2769  double E_Sph1_Sph1 = 0.0; // <- Sph1-Sph1 interaction permanent + induced
2770  double E_Pair_Sph2 = 0.0; // <- Pair-Sph2 interaction permanent + induced
2771 
2772 
2773  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
2774  vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
2775  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
2776  vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
2777  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
2778  vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
2779 
2780  if (job->getType() == "pair") {
2781 
2782  // +++++++++++++++++ //
2783  // Inter-site energy //
2784  // +++++++++++++++++ //
2785 
2786  for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
2787  sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2788  ++sit1, ++seg1) {
2789  for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
2790  sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
2791  ++sit2, ++seg2) {
2792 
2793  //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*seg1)->getPos(),_seg->getPos()))
2794  // > _master->_cutoff) { throw runtime_error("Not this."); }

2796  //cout << "\r... ... Calculating interaction energy for pair "

2798 
2799  // Intra-pair interaction?
2800  if ( ((*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id() || (*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id())
2801  && ((*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id() || (*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id()) ) {
2802 
2803  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2804  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2805 
2806  //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
2807  //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
2808 
2809  E_Pair_Pair += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2810  }}
2811  }
2812 
2813  // Pair-non-pair interaction
2814  else if ( ((*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id() || (*seg1)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id())
2815  ^ ((*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg1Id() || (*seg2)->getId() == job->getSeg2Id()) ) {
2816 
2817  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2818  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2819 
2820  //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
2821  //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
2822 
2823  E_Pair_Sph1 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2824  }}
2825  }
2826 
2827  // Non-pair-non-pair interaction?
2828  else {
2829  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2830  for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
2831 
2832  //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
2833  //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
2834 
2835  E_Sph1_Sph1 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2836  }}
2837  }
2838 
2839  }}
2840 
2841  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
2842  // Outer-Shell energy //
2843  // ++++++++++++++++++ //
2844 
2845  vector< PolarSite* > central1 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg1Id() - 1 ];
2846  vector< PolarSite* > central2 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg2Id() - 1 ];
2847 
2848  for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
2849  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2850  for (pit2 = central1.begin(); pit2 < central1.end(); ++pit2) {
2851  E_Pair_Sph2 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2852  }
2853  }
2854  }
2855  for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
2856  for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
2857  for (pit2 = central2.begin(); pit2 < central2.end(); ++pit2) {
2858  E_Pair_Sph2 += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
2859  }
2860  }
2861  }
2862 
2863 
2864  E_Tot = E_Pair_Pair + E_Pair_Sph1 + E_Sph1_Sph1 + E_Pair_Sph2;
2865 
2866  if (_master->_maverick) {
2867  cout << endl << "... ... ... ... "
2868  << "E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot * int2eV << " eV "
2869  << " = (Pair, pair) " << E_Pair_Pair * int2eV
2870  << " + (Pair, Sph1) " << E_Pair_Sph1 * int2eV
2871  << " + (Sph1, Sph1) " << E_Sph1_Sph1 * int2eV
2872  << " + (Pair, sph2) " << E_Pair_Sph2 * int2eV

2874  }

2882  << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA() * int2eV
2883  << " , with (O ~) " << E_Pair_Sph2 * int2eV << " eV"
2884  << flush;
2885  }
2886 
2887  job->setEnergy(E_Tot*int2eV, E_Pair_Pair*int2eV,
2888  E_Pair_Sph1*int2eV, E_Sph1_Sph1*int2eV,
2889  E_Pair_Sph2*int2eV,
2890  _actor.getEP()*int2eV, _actor.getEU_INTER() * int2eV);

3277 
3281 inline double XMP::XInteractor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
3282  PolarSite &pol) {
3283 
3284  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3285  e12 = pol.getPos() - r;
3286  R = 1/abs(e12);
3287  R2 = R*R;
3288  R3 = R2*R;
3289  R4 = R3*R;
3290  R5 = R4*R;
3291  e12 *= R;
3292 
3293 
3294 
3295 
3296  rbx = - e12.getX();
3297  rby = - e12.getX();
3298  rbz = - e12.getX();
3299 
3300  double phi00 = 0.0;
3301 
3302  phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
3303 
3304  if (pol._rank > 0) {
3305  phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3306  phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3307  phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3308  }
3309 
3310  if (pol._rank > 1) {
3311  phi00 += T00_20() * pol.Q20;
3312  phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3313  phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3314  phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3315  phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3316  }
3317 
3318  return phi00;
3319 }
3320 
3324 inline vec XMP::XInteractor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
3325  PolarSite &pol) {
3326  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3327  e12 = pol.getPos() - r;
3328  R = 1/abs(e12);
3329  R2 = R*R;
3330  R3 = R2*R;
3331  R4 = R3*R;
3332  R5 = R4*R;
3333  e12 *= R;
3334 
3335  rax = e12.getX();
3336  ray = e12.getY();
3337  raz = e12.getZ();
3338  rbx = - rax;
3339  rby = - ray;
3340  rbz = - raz;
3341 
3342  cxx = 1;
3343  cxy = 0;
3344  cxz = 0;
3345  cyx = 0;
3346  cyy = 1;
3347  cyz = 0;
3348  czx = 0;
3349  czy = 0;
3350  czz = 1;
3351 
3352  double Fx = 0.0;
3353  double Fy = 0.0;
3354  double Fz = 0.0;
3355 
3356  // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
3357  Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
3358  Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
3359  Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
3360 
3361  // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
3362  if (pol._rank > 0) {
3363  Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3364  Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3365  Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3366 
3367  Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3368  Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3369  Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3370 
3371  Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
3372  Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
3373  Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
3374  }
3375 
3376  // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
3377  if (pol._rank > 1) {
3378  Fx += T1x_20() * pol.Q20;
3379  Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3380  Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3381  Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3382  Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3383 
3384  Fy += T1y_20() * pol.Q20;
3385  Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3386  Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3387  Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3388  Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3389 
3390  Fz += T1z_20() * pol.Q20;
3391  Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
3392  Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
3393  Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
3394  Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
3395  }
3396 
3397  return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
3398 }
3399 
3403 inline void XMP::XInteractor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
3404  PolarSite &pol2) {
3405  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3406  e12 = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
3407  R = 1/abs(e12);
3408  R2 = R*R;
3409  R3 = R2*R;
3410  R4 = R3*R;
3411  R5 = R4*R;
3412  e12 *= R;
3413 
3414  // Thole damping init.
3415  a = _xm->_aDamp;
3416  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3417 
3418 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3419 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3420 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3421 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3422 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3423 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3424 
3425  rax = e12.getX();
3426  ray = e12.getY();
3427  raz = e12.getZ();
3428  rbx = - rax;
3429  rby = - ray;
3430  rbz = - raz;
3431 
3432 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3433 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3434 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3435 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3436 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3437 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3438 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3439 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3440 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3441 
3442  cxx = 1;
3443  cxy = 0;
3444  cxz = 0;
3445  cyx = 0;
3446  cyy = 1;
3447  cyz = 0;
3448  czx = 0;
3449  czy = 0;
3450  czz = 1;
3451 
3452  // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
3453 
3454  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3455  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3456  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3457  pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3458  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3459  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3460  pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3461  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3462  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3463  pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3464 
3465  pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
3466  pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
3467  pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
3468  pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
3469  pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
3470  pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
3471  pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
3472  pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
3473  pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
3474  }
3475  else {
3476  pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3477  pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3478  pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3479  pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3480  pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3481  pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3482  pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3483  pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3484  pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3485 
3486  pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
3487  pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
3488  pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
3489  pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
3490  pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
3491  pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
3492  pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
3493  pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
3494  pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
3495  }
3496 }

3601 inline void XMP::XInteractor::FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1,
3602  PolarSite &pol2) {
3603 
3604  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3605  // This implies that induced = - alpha * field
3606  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3607  R = 1/abs(e12);
3608  R2 = R*R;
3609  R3 = R2*R;
3610  R4 = R3*R;
3611  R5 = R4*R;
3612  e12 *= R;
3613 
3614 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3615 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3616 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3617 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3618 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3619 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3620 
3621  rax = e12.getX();
3622  ray = e12.getY();
3623  raz = e12.getZ();
3624  rbx = - rax;
3625  rby = - ray;
3626  rbz = - raz;
3627 
3628  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
3629 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3630 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3631 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3632 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3633 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3634 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3635 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3636 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3637 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3638 
3639  cxx = 1;
3640  cxy = 0;
3641  cxz = 0;
3642  cyx = 0;
3643  cyy = 1;
3644  cyz = 0;
3645  czx = 0;
3646  czy = 0;
3647  czz = 1;
3648  }
3649 
3650  // Fields generated by rank-0 m'poles
3651  pol1.FPx += T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3652  pol1.FPy += T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3653  pol1.FPz += T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3654 
3655  pol2.FPx += T00_1x() * pol1.Q00;
3656  pol2.FPy += T00_1y() * pol1.Q00;
3657  pol2.FPz += T00_1z() * pol1.Q00;
3658 
3659  // Fields generated by rank-1 m'poles
3660  if (pol2._rank > 0) {
3661  pol1.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3662  pol1.FPx += T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3663  pol1.FPx += T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3664  pol1.FPy += T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3665  pol1.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3666  pol1.FPy += T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3667  pol1.FPz += T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
3668  pol1.FPz += T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
3669  pol1.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
3670  }
3671  if (pol1._rank > 0) {
3672  pol2.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol1.Q1x;
3673  pol2.FPx += T1y_1x() * pol1.Q1y;
3674  pol2.FPx += T1z_1x() * pol1.Q1z;
3675  pol2.FPy += T1x_1y() * pol1.Q1x;
3676  pol2.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol1.Q1y;
3677  pol2.FPy += T1z_1y() * pol1.Q1z;
3678  pol2.FPz += T1x_1z() * pol1.Q1x;
3679  pol2.FPz += T1y_1z() * pol1.Q1y;
3680  pol2.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol1.Q1z;
3681  }
3682 
3683  // Fields generated by rank-2 m'poles
3684  if (pol2._rank > 1) {
3685  pol1.FPx += T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
3686  pol1.FPx += T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3687  pol1.FPx += T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3688  pol1.FPx += T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3689  pol1.FPx += T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3690 
3691  pol1.FPy += T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
3692  pol1.FPy += T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3693  pol1.FPy += T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3694  pol1.FPy += T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3695  pol1.FPy += T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3696 
3697  pol1.FPz += T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
3698  pol1.FPz += T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3699  pol1.FPz += T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3700  pol1.FPz += T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3701  pol1.FPz += T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3702  }
3703  if (pol1._rank > 1) {
3704  pol2.FPx += T20_1x() * pol1.Q20;
3705  pol2.FPx += T21c_1x() * pol1.Q21c;
3706  pol2.FPx += T21s_1x() * pol1.Q21s;
3707  pol2.FPx += T22c_1x() * pol1.Q22c;
3708  pol2.FPx += T22s_1x() * pol1.Q22s;
3709 
3710  pol2.FPy += T20_1y() * pol1.Q20;
3711  pol2.FPy += T21c_1y() * pol1.Q21c;
3712  pol2.FPy += T21s_1y() * pol1.Q21s;
3713  pol2.FPy += T22c_1y() * pol1.Q22c;
3714  pol2.FPy += T22s_1y() * pol1.Q22s;
3715 
3716  pol2.FPz += T20_1z() * pol1.Q20;
3717  pol2.FPz += T21c_1z() * pol1.Q21c;
3718  pol2.FPz += T21s_1z() * pol1.Q21s;
3719  pol2.FPz += T22c_1z() * pol1.Q22c;
3720  pol2.FPz += T22s_1z() * pol1.Q22s;
3721  }
3722 }

3727 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1,
3728  PolarSite &pol2) {
3729 
3730  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3731  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3732  R = 1/abs(e12);
3733  R2 = R*R;
3734  R3 = R2*R;
3735  R4 = R3*R;
3736  R5 = R4*R;
3737  e12 *= R;
3738 
3739  // Thole damping init.
3740  a = _xm->_aDamp;
3741  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3742 
3743 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3744 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3745 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3746 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3747 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3748 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
3749 
3750  rax = e12.getX();
3751  ray = e12.getY();
3752  raz = e12.getZ();
3753  rbx = - rax;
3754  rby = - ray;
3755  rbz = - raz;
3756 
3757  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
3758 // cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
3759 // cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
3760 // cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
3761 // cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
3762 // cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
3763 // cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
3764 // czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
3765 // czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
3766 // czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
3767 
3768  cxx = 1;
3769  cxy = 0;
3770  cxz = 0;
3771  cyx = 0;
3772  cyy = 1;
3773  cyz = 0;
3774  czx = 0;
3775  czy = 0;
3776  czz = 1;
3777  }
3778 
3779  double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
3780 
3781  if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
3782  U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3783  U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3784  U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3785 
3786  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3787  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3788  U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3789  }
3790  else {
3791  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
3792  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
3793  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
3794 
3795  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
3796  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
3797  U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
3798  }
3799

3822  }
3823  }

3913  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;

3915  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
3916  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
3917  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
3918  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
3919  }
3920  }
3921 
3922  // Take into account work needed to induce multipoles
3923  U *= 0.5;
3924 
3925  EU_INTRA += U;
3926  return U;
3927 }

3932 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1,
3933  PolarSite &pol2) {
3934 
3935  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
3936  e12 = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
3937  R = 1/abs(e12);
3938  R2 = R*R;
3939  R3 = R2*R;
3940  R4 = R3*R;
3941  R5 = R4*R;
3942  e12 *= R;
3943 
3944  // Thole damping init.
3945  a = _xm->_aDamp;
3946  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
3947 
3948 
3949  //cout << "frag1 " << pol1.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
3950  //cout << "frag2 " << pol2.getFragment()->getId() << endl;

3952  //cout << "seg2 " << pol2.getSegment()->getId() << endl;

3954 
3955 // rax = pol1._locX * e12;
3956 // ray = pol1._locY * e12;
3957 // raz = pol1._locZ * e12;
3958 // rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
3959 // rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
3960 // rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;

3963  ray = e12.getY();
3964  raz = e12.getZ();

3966  rby = - ray;

3979

4186  U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;

4267

4272  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4273  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4274  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4275 
4276 
4277  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4278  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4279  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4280  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4281 
4282  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4283  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4284  }
4285  //cout << "E up to Q <-> Q " << E << endl;
4286 
4287 
4288  // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
4289  U *= 0.5;
4290 
4291  EP += E;
4292  EU_INTER += U;
4293  return E + U;
4294 }

4299 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1,
4300  PolarSite &pol2) {
4301 
4302  // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
4303  e12 = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
4304  R = 1/abs(e12);
4305  R2 = R*R;
4306  R3 = R2*R;
4307  R4 = R3*R;
4308  R5 = R4*R;
4309  e12 *= R;
4310 
4311  // Thole damping init.
4312  a = _xm->_aDamp;
4313  u3 = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
4314 
4315  rax = e12.getX();
4316  ray = e12.getY();
4317  raz = e12.getZ();
4318  rbx = - rax;
4319  rby = - ray;
4320  rbz = - raz;
4321 
4322  if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
4323 
4324  cxx = 1;
4325  cxy = 0;
4326  cxz = 0;
4327  cyx = 0;
4328  cyy = 1;
4329  cyz = 0;
4330  czx = 0;
4331  czy = 0;
4332  czz = 1;

4334

4336  double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
4337

4339 
4340  if (a*u3 < 40) {

4555  U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4556  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
4557  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4558  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4559  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4560  U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4561  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
4562  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4563  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4564  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4565  U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4566  }
4567  }
4568 
4569  if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
4570  E += pol1.Q20 * T20_20() * pol2.Q20;
4571  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4572  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4573  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4574  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4575 
4576 
4577  E += pol1.Q20 * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4578  E += pol1.Q20 * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4579  E += pol1.Q20 * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4580  E += pol1.Q20 * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4581  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
4582  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
4583  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
4584  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
4585 
4586 
4587  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4588  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4589  E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4590  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4591  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4592  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
4593 
4594 
4595  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4596  E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4597  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4598  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
4599 
4600  E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
4601  E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
4602  }
4603 
4604  // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
4605  U *= 0.5;
4606 
4607  return E + U;
4608 }
4609 
4610 
4611 
4612 }}
4613 
4614 #endif
